definition: to create/to inaugurate/to contrive/to build (a mechanism)
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The history of Liuyang fireworks dates back to the year 1740.
sentences.chinese: 浏阳花炮创制于1740年，生产历史悠久。

sentences.english: Plum green glaze is a outstanding celadon glaze originated in Longquan Kiln in Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 梅子青是南宋龙泉窑创制的杰出青釉品种。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the characteristics of composing prescription have been put forward and Wei Chang An, an empirical prescription created by…
sentences.chinese: 并提出处方用药特点，创制了胃肠安有效经验方。

sentences.english: Miao's alphabetic character being made; the formation of country educational network structure and so on.
sentences.chinese: 创制苗文及乡村教育网络的形成等。

sentences.english: The pesticide's formulation is a group scientific research activity which is connected with transsubjects on a large scale.
sentences.chinese: 农药的创制是一项大规模的跨学科的集体科研活动。

sentences.english: Tongcheng flowers created in the Ming Dynasty, produced in Tongcheng, is a green tea category.
sentences.chinese: 桐城小花创制于明代，产于桐城市，属绿茶类。

sentences.english: The bulk of American contract law is judge-made case law.
sentences.chinese: 美国合同法的大部分是由法官创制的判例法。

sentences.english: Now we are going to make some "space dust".
sentences.chinese: 现在，我们将要创制一些“空间烟尘”。

sentences.english: Initiative or referendum of important policies.
sentences.chinese: 重大政策之创制或复决。

sentences.english: he believes there is nothing he can’t create out of LEGO.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，用乐高没有他创制不出的东西。

sentences.english: Sweet-scented osmanthus cake created in the late Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 桂花糕创制于明朝末期。

sentences.english: Unlike the federal government, several states also allow for citizen initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 和联邦政府不一样的事，一些州也允许公民创制权。

sentences.english: This exclusionary rule wasn't carved out by the courts until 1961.
sentences.chinese: 这个排除规则直到1961年才由法院创制。

sentences.english: Children of the night. Whon music they make.
sentences.chinese: 白昼中孩子的声响是他们创制的奇妙音乐。

definition: to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
to create/to come up with (an idea etc)
to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
lit. floating wine goblets on a stream/the origin (of some phenomenon)
